channel.title: Free Software on Alejandro Coria Games
channel.description: Recent content in Free Software on Alejandro Coria Games

item.title: Map​Frontiers
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: This mod is an addon for Journey Map that allows you to divide the map into regions and assign them names, colors and a banner. Need Journey Map 1.12.2-5.7.0 or 1.16.5-5.7.3.

item.title: Auto​Preset​Map
item.author: contact@alejandrocoria.games (Alejandro Coria)
item.description: This mod is an addon for Journey Map that changes the minimap preset when you change dimension. It is for the client (Forge or Fabric), it is not needed on the server. To configure it, use the button to the right on the JourneyMap fullscreen map.
